registration_down: Sorry! The registration for this week has ended, join us next week for a chance to win!
about_2: Finish the weekly mission to double your chances
about_3: Come back weekly for the winners announcement
gift_1_1: Gaming system to enjoy at home or on the go, play alone or with your friends by sharing Joy-con.
gift_2_1: A mini compact instant camera that includes a selfie mirror and a close up lens to capture memorable moments
gift_3_1: A light weight, comfortable headphone that includes a bendable microphone for your comfort
gift_4_1: All new dual camera system with ultra wide and night mode, the iPhone 11 128 GB.
tos_1: Participation is solely based on content uploaded and is not related to purchase. Any person who follows the steps is eligible to be part of the draw.
tos_2: Double chance participants who duplicate pictures will be eliminated.
tos_3: This draw is exclusive for Saudi Arabia residents.
tos_4: Winners will be announced weekly on our website and social media accounts.
tos_5: The campaign will start on the 4th of November until the 15th of December.
tos_6: Winners will be chosen by Jeddah Chamber of Commerce through a random withdraw program.
tos_7: Winners have to take their gifts from Tokyo Games branches mention below before the 15th of January 2020, if the gift has not been received by that date it will be cancelled.
tos_8: This campaign is for everyone except Binzagr CO-RO employees, their families and suppliers.
tos_9: By accepting these terms and conditions you accept to receive a Suntop SMS notification
tos_10: Anyone who participates in the promotion is agreeing to all the terms and conditions as stated.
step_4_title: Thank you for participating, come back next week to participate in a new draw
step_4_1: One more step to double your chances
title_week1: Take a picture of 4X250 ml pack of Suntop in your fridge (any flavor you like)
title_week2: Take a pic of 8x125ml in a pyramid shape (any flavor you like)
title_week3: Please take a picture of Suntop in your favorite place to enjoy it (any flavor you like)
title_week4: Please take a picture of Suntop in your local supermarket
title_week5: Please take a picture of a Suntop family
title_week6: Please take a picture of the new Suntop Plus
final_step_2: Come back next week to participate in a new draw.
